gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 129, Pistons 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Pistons, 129-115. Tyrese Haliburton led the way with 25 points and 13 assists for the Pacers, while Pascal Siakam added 20 points, four rebounds, and two assists in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 30 points, eight assists, and five rebounds for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 32-25, while the Pistons fall to 8-47.
